name: Ryan Stansifer
content: Ryan Stansifer Information Ryan Stansifer Professor Emeritus EE and Computer Science Florida Institute of Technology 150 West University Boulevard Melbourne, Florida 32901-6975 WWW: http://cs.fit.edu/~ryan/ Former students are also encouraged to send e-mail to me, and let me know what they are doing. Professional interests The areas of Computer Science I'm most interested in are the following: programming languages compilers internationalization more specifically: functional programming and type systems typed, object-oriented programming static analysis of programs the Java programming language software development and formal verification character sets for representing natural languages Ph.D Students Daniel Wetklow Steve Atkin In the international competition for the Best Thesis Award organized by Localisation Research Centre of the University of Limerick, Ireland, honorable mention is given to: "Steven Atkin of the Florida Institute of Technology (USA) for his PhD thesis 'A Framework for Multilingual Information Processing.' His thesis presents general software globalisation issues, character encoding systems, issues around bi-directional text and the enhancement of plain text as a basis for the application of metacode layers with exemplary academic depth and scholarship."
